data.client_settings: Desktop Release Channel: ptb, Build Number: 9535
data.actual_result: The animated emojis lags and sometimes stop until you don't scroll anymore
data.expected_result: The animated emojis should just continue to move without "lag" or stopping movements
data.short_description: Scrolling channels list causes animated emojis to "lag"
data.steps_to_repro: - Be able to send animated emojis - Go to a server where you can scroll channels - Send animated emojis - Scroll the channels list, or point mouse to a channel name and try to scroll
